Description:
Position Title:             Travel Retail RecruiterEmployment Type:     Temporary Contract (4 months)Salary:                         up to 25K AED depending on experience and qualifications plus car allowanceJob Location:            Dubai and Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:A well-established company in the consumer goods industry providing service to an international reach. Job Description:Perform end-to-end recruitment
Source (post job ads and screen) qualified candidates for various retail positions
Conduct initial and final screening interviews for shortlisted candidates
Negotiate offer to selected candidatesSkills
Skills:
40 years old and below
Minimum 3 years of experience in travel retail
Preferably with valid UAE driving license
Must be available to join immediately
